channel.title: DNS on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in DNS on Scott O'Brien

item.title: What’s the harm in Google DNS?Performance!
item.description: EDIT: It looks like Google has recently starting peering in more places in AU with an anycast solution that fixes these issues. On a little side note to the tutorial series I’ve been writing up lately for building a ZFS fileserver. This one is about Why Google DNS is bad for your performance (well, depending on where you live) A real quick run down, we all know what DNS does yeah?
